document_data.name: ''Bands of Might''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Bands of might''''' were [[bracer]]s enchanted with the [[pluma]] [[spell]] ''[[create talisman]]''.
document_data.Description: These bands were quite thin and worn around the wrists.
document_data.Powers: ''Bands of might'' provided supernatural strength to the wearer. The degree of strength provided by the bands was directly related to the skill of the artisan who created them.
